1.Title: Kiss of Death
1.Description: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> more DMG to the target.

2.Title: Kiss of Death
2.Description: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>17.5%</color> more DMG to the target.

3.Title: Kiss of Death
3.Description: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> more DMG to the target.

4.Title: Kiss of Death
4.Description: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>22.5%</color> more DMG to the target.

5.Title: Kiss of Death
5.Description: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> more DMG to the target.
